alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 08 at 1:59PM MST until January 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TUESDAY TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches. * WHERE...Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs. * WHEN...From 8 AM Tuesday to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Briefly heavy snow and strong winds are expected late Tuesday afternoon and early evening as well as late Wednesday afternoon and early evening as a pair of cold fronts pass through. Multiple additional rounds of snow are expected through the weekend.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
